```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Day 1}
day1 = scan("data/01-input.txt", blank.lines.skip = FALSE)

backpacks = list(c())
bckp = c()

i = 1

for (n in day1){
  if (is.na(n)){
    backpacks = append(backpacks, list(bckp), after = i)
    bckp = c()
    
    i = i+1
    } else {
      bckp = append(bckp, n)
    }
}
lapply(backpacks, sum) %>% unlist() %>% max()
lapply(backpacks, sum) %>% unlist() %>% sort() %>% tail(3) %>% sum()
```
